/usr/bin/c++  -std=c++11 -g -Wall  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/5.advanced_lighting__3.2.2.point_shadows_soft.dir/src/5.advanced_lighting/3.2.2.point_shadows_soft/point_shadows_soft.cpp.o  -o bin/5.advanced_lighting/5.advanced_lighting__3.2.2.point_shadows_soft  -L/home/irfan/LearnOpenGL/lib -Wl,-rpath,/home/irfan/LearnOpenGL/lib /usr/local/lib/libglfw3.a -lX11 -lXrandr -lXinerama -lXi -lXxf86vm -lXcursor -lGL -ldl -lpthread -lassimp libSTB_IMAGE.a libGLAD.a  -ldl
